column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I dont know where to star about this place!!! i FREAKING LOVEEEEEEEEE IT!!!!!!!!!! my favorite person and server is Daniel!!! he is so damn amazing!!!! he has offered sooooo many awesome suggestions every-time i cone and i have yet to be let down by him!!! I absolutley love the spicy chicken ramen and the miso ramen and the tokonostsu (spell check) ramen.!!! i visit this place atleat 5 time a month!!! i crave the ramen here!! i also like their shrimp balls and dumplings!! i could go on and on about Jinya but its definitely one of my top places to dine!!!
